rows.label: qst201205_msg0001
rows.name: Th-the mercs ain't cutting it...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0002
rows.name:
Damn you! I won't let you
lay a finger on my lads!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0003
rows.name:
Just wait! You got it wrong! We just
wanted to apologize for the past!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0004
rows.name:
You stinkin' liar! I'll never
believe a word that comes
outta your bloody mouth!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0005
rows.name: ...Pointless, just like I said.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0006
rows.name:
...Mikumari, let's go. There's
no atoning for our sins.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0007
rows.name:
No, Seori, wait! I'm not gonna
give up just like that!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0008
rows.name:
Do you want to live the rest of your
life being seen as a criminal?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0009
rows.name: 'Cos I sure don't!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0010
rows.name:
We're different now... Seori,
you're actually a kind-hearted
person, deep down...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0011
rows.name: I need everyone to know that!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0012
rows.name: Oh dear...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0013
rows.name: Mister, just listen, please!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0014
rows.name:
It's true, we may have done
nasty things to you and your
friends in the past...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0015
rows.name:
even if we don't remember it, on
account of being newly reawakened...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0016
rows.name:
Anyway, I know that doesn't
make the crime go away! I do!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0017
rows.name:
But our new friends are all
such kind, gentle folks...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0018
rows.name:
They really believe in
us! All of them do!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0019
rows.name:
So I want to make up for the
bad stuff, to prove their
faith wasn't misplaced!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0020
rows.name: Uh...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0021
rows.name:
I'm only asking you
to give us a chance!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0022
rows.name:
I don't know if we can make you forgive
us completely, but if there's anything
we can help with, we will!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0023
rows.name: Even cleaning, or laundry, or, or...!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0024
rows.name:
...Mikumari, you know you're
terrible at housework.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0025
rows.name:
Right! Uh... Then... Then
Seori will take that part!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0026
rows.name: Me?!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0027
rows.name: So then I could, um...

rows.label: qst201205_msg0028
rows.name:
I know! Guard duty, or
monster eradication. That's
what I'm awesome at!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0029
rows.name: Pff... Bahaha!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0030
rows.name:
Yeah, okay, I can definitely
tell you guys have changed!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0031
rows.name:
When we last met, you were
cold-blooded killer-type Blades.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0032
rows.name:
And now you're, well, the polar
opposites of that I guess.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0033
rows.name:
Looks like you got pretty lucky
with your Drivers this time round.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0034
rows.name: ...So, um, what do we...?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0035
rows.name:
Ah, no worries! I heard
ya, loud and clear.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0036
rows.name:
If you want to apologize
to the people of this town,
I'll be happy to help.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0037
rows.name: For real?! Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0038
rows.name:
But, ah... Considering the stuff
before, folks might be uneasy
about giving you fightin' jobs.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0039
rows.name: *sigh* So I guess I won't be useful?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0040
rows.name:
I didn't say that... We've got a
harvest festival coming up, when it's
customary to give kids sweet stuff.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0041
rows.name:
Around here, it's Whelzaman Cookies.
How about you make them and hand
them out for us this year?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0042
rows.name:
I think it'd be a perfect job
for regaining people's trust.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0043
rows.name: Yes! I'll work at it day and night!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0044
rows.name:
...Mikumari, how do you
make Whelzaman Cookies?

rows.label: qst201205_msg0045
rows.name:
No clue! But I'm sure it'll be fine!
So long as we try our hardest!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0046
rows.name:
...You can't make up for everything
with enthusiasm, you know.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0047
rows.name:
I have a friend who's a
great cook, she can teach
you. The name's Raviant.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0048
rows.name:
She runs a restaurant above
the square in the Fons Maim
Commercial District.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0049
rows.name: Thanks for the tip!

rows.label: qst201205_msg0050
rows.name: ...It helps.

rows.label: qst201205_msg0051
rows.name: Okay, Seori! Let's go learn!
